title: Where Excellence and Convenience Meet.
posting_body: Soquel Village Greens Townhomes are located in the city of Soquel, just minutes from New Brighton Beach, the Forest of Nisene Marks, Aptos, Santa Cruz and Capitola.
At Soquel Green Townhomes we are dedicated to providing you with the perfect place to call home.
Attention to detail and quality customer service are just a few of the ways that we achieve this goal.

Our beautiful townhome community is located within minutes to amazing shopping centers like Aptos Village and Rancho del Mar, many restaurants, shops of all kinds and a variety of grocery stores and schools.
Soquel Village Greens Townhomes is also in the perfect location near Highway 1 with easy access to Highway 17.
Call us to schedule your tour today!
•	Enclosed lush green backyard with patio
Professionally managed by Prodesse Property Group
